sources.title: Ruby's Bucket of Blood | FULL MOVIE | Romantic Ensemble Drama
sources.description:
Passion runs as ripe as the sweltering bayou summer when a forbidden relationship becomes an inevitable catalyst that changes the lives of everyone it touches in a Louisiana club. Starring Angela Bassett ("Black Panther") and Jurnee Smollett ("Birds of Prey").

#romance #love #movie #relationships #blackcinema #africanamerican #black #character #drama #ensemble #cast #forbidden #lovers #comingofage #deep #louisiana #bayou #summer #summerlove #race

metadata.Plot: A Louisiana juke joint owner loses her star entertainer and hires a white singer to fill in.
metadata.Actors: Angela Bassett, Kevin Anderson, Brian Stokes Mitchell
